mapper.select: select profile, r.* from user inner join (select channel.*, favorite.type from channel inner join favorite on channel.channelnum = favorite.channelnum where favorite.userid = #{userid}) r on user.userid = r.userid

select videonum, channelnum, userid, title, description, thumbnail, visibility, (TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, register, CURDATE())) register , views, likes, videofile, videotime from video where register between date_sub(sysdate(), INTERVAL 7 day) and sysdate() order by views desc limit 100
select channel.userid, channel.aka, subscribers, channelnum, profile from channel inner JOIN user on user.userid = channel.userid order by subscribers desc limit 10;
